Class BigCitiesCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.Card.Card

  • public class BigCitiesCard
extends PointsCard
    A class that represents a BigCity card in the game
    Author:
    Nikos Gounakis

      • getNumberOfvisits

        public int getNumberOfvisits(boolean flag)
        Accessor :
